#**Data Visualization**
```{r}
#install.packages("mosaicData")
library(ggplot2)
data(Marriage, package = "mosaicData")
Marriage

```

```{r}
# plot the distribution of race
ggplot(Marriage, aes(x = race)) + 
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
# plot the distribution as percentages
ggplot(Marriage, 
       aes(x = race, 
           y = ..count.. / sum(..count..))) + 
  geom_bar() +
  labs(x = "Race", 
       y = "Percent", 
       title  = "Participants by race") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent)
```


```{r}
# calculate number of participants in 
# each race category
library(dplyr)
plotdata <- Marriage %>%
 count(race)
plotdata
```


```{r}
# plot the bars in ascending order
ggplot(plotdata, 
       aes(x = reorder(race, n), 
           y = n)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  labs(x = "Race", 
       y = "Frequency", 
       title  = "Participants by race")
```


```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
plotdata <- Marriage %>%
  count(race) %>%
  mutate(pct = n / sum(n),
         pctlabel = paste0(round(pct*100), "%"))
plotdata
```


```{r}
# plot the bars as percentages, 
# in decending order with bar labels
ggplot(plotdata, 
       aes(x = reorder(race, -pct),
           y = pct)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", 
           fill = "indianred3", 
           color = "black") +
  geom_text(aes(label = pctlabel), 
            vjust = -0.25) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = percent) +
  labs(x = "Race", 
       y = "Percent", 
       title  = "Participants by race")
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
mpg

```


```{r}
# stacked bar chart
ggplot(mpg, 
       aes(x = class, 
           fill = drv)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "stack")
```


```{r}
# create a summary dataset
library(dplyr)
plotdata <- mpg %>%
  group_by(class, drv) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>% 
  mutate(pct = n/sum(n),
         lbl = scales::percent(pct))
plotdata
```


```{r}
# create segmented bar chart
# adding labels to each segment

ggplot(plotdata, 
       aes(x = factor(class,
                      levels = c("2seater", "subcompact", 
                                 "compact", "midsize", 
                                 "minivan", "suv", "pickup")),
           y = pct,
           fill = factor(drv, 
                         levels = c("f", "r", "4"),
                         labels = c("front-wheel", 
                                    "rear-wheel", 
                                    "4-wheel")))) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity",
           position = "fill") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 1, .2), 
                     label = percent) +
  geom_text(aes(label = lbl), 
            size = 3, 
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  labs(y = "Percent", 
       fill = "Drive Train",
       x = "Class",
       title = "Automobile Drive by Class") +
  theme_minimal()
```
